data.name: Heroine Anthem Zero 2：Colorful Feather Pack II
data.detailed_description:
Colorful Feather Pack II Content :


Shama 2 SKIN EQUIPMENTS ( SHAMA can change the appearance with 2 different styles )
1 Waste Soil Style Shama
2 Hot Shama

Cuckoo ( PET ) 1 SKIN EQUIPMENTS ( Cuckoo can change the appearance with 1 different styles )
1 Shadow Cuckoo

Bibi ( PET ) 2 SKIN EQUIPMENTS ( Bibi can change the appearance with 2 different styles )
1 War Pattern Bibi
2 Red Hag Bibi

Mormolia ( PET ) 2 SKIN EQUIPMENTS ( Mormolia can change the appearance with 2 different styles )
1 Starlight Mormolia
2 Psychedelics Mormolia

  • ADDITIONAL GIFT
    Guardian Owl Ex *10 ( Resurrection with full blood and at the same place )

***How to get the DLC item !!!
https://steamcommunity.com/games/787850/announcements/detail/1607136397660047684

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: IntelR Core i5-2500 up or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 640M or AMD Radeon HD 5670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
